extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected ColdFusion Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the installed version of Adobe ColdFusion is affected by checking the version number.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed ColdFusion version affected?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to ColdFusion 2023 GA build
extracted_playbook.description: Update Adobe ColdFusion 2023 to the GA build to remediate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to ColdFusion 2021 Update 7
extracted_playbook.description: Update Adobe ColdFusion 2021 to Update 7 to remediate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to ColdFusion 2018 Update 17
extracted_playbook.description: Update Adobe ColdFusion 2018 to Update 17 to remediate the vulnerability.
